titleInfo.title: 'File 5/12 Storage of Munitions in Bahrain for Naval Purposes'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order. Circled index numbers written using red ink are also present in the file.
Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are written in pencil and can be found in the top right of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between Hugh Weightman, British Political Agent at Bahrain; Charles Geoffrey Prior, British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bushire; Cosmo Moray Graham, Senior Naval Officer, Persian Gulf; Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government; F H Phillips, Admiralty; the Under-Secretary of State for India; Master of the SS Barjora; Commanding Officer of the HMIS Hindustan; and Messrs Gray Mackenzie and Company Limited.The correspondence concern the building of an Admiralty Ammunition Store on Jiddah Island, Bahrain, and sailing orders and telegrams relating to the SS Barjora, an ammunition carrier. Among the correspondence are a rough plan for the ammunition store and payment for the facility.
